queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find crowdstrike_sensor as e
return e.platformName as name, count(e) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find user_endpoint with _integrationName~='JAMF' as a
RETURN count(a) AS value

widgets.title: JAMF Devices NOT Protected By CrowdStrike

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find user_endpoint with _integrationName~='JAMF' 
that !has jamf_computer_group with displayName="Crowdstrike - Installed" as a 
return count(a) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find user_endpoint with _integrationName~='JAMF' 
that has jamf_computer_group with displayName="Crowdstrike - Installed" as a 
return count(a) as value

widgets.title: CrowdStrike Sensors By Platform Type Reporting In The Last 24 Hours

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find crowdstrike_sensor with lastSeenOn > date.now - 24 hours as e
return e.platformName as name, count(e) as value

widgets.title: Crowdstrike Sensors NOT Seen In The Last 7 Days

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find crowdstrike_sensor with date.now - 7 days > lastSeenOn as e
return e.platformName as name, count(e) as value

widgets.title: JAMF Devices Missing Encryption on the Network in the Last 24 Hours

queries.name: query 1
queries.query:
Find user_endpoint With (lastSeenOn > date.now - 1 days) AND (encrypted!=true or encrypted=false) AS e
RETURN count(e) as value

widgets.title: List of CrowdStrike Sensors Not Seen in the Last 7 Days

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find crowdstrike_sensor with date.now - 7 days > lastSeenOn as e
RETURN e.displayName, e.hostname, e.lastSeenOn, e.macAddress, e.osVersion

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find user_endpoint with _integrationName~='JAMF' 
that has jamf_computer_group with displayName="Crowdstrike - Not Installed" as a 
return count(a) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find user_endpoint with _integrationName~='JAMF' 
that has jamf_computer_group with displayName="Crowdstrike - Installed" as a 
return count(a) as value

widgets.title: Does NOT have EITHER  jamf_computer_group with displayName="Crowdstrike - Not Installed" OR displayName="Crowdstrike - Installed"

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find user_endpoint with _integrationName~='JAMF' 
that !has jamf_computer_group with (displayName="Crowdstrike - Installed" OR displayName="Crowdstrike - Not Installed") as a 
return count(a) as value

widgets.title: List of JAMF Devices Missing Encryption on Network in the Last 24 Hours

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find user_endpoint With (lastSeenOn > date.now - 1 days) AND (encrypted!=true or encrypted=false) AS e
RETURN e.displayName, e.encrypted, e.lastSeenOn

markdown.text:
Some potential edits may be needed for the widget queries below to accomdate integration names and the jamf_computer_group naming conventions you are using to distribute CrowdStrike sensor code.

(Remove this widget when done)
